dcterms:creator: X. Wang
Y. Peng
L. Lu
Z. Lu

R. M. Summers
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1,297,699 X-ray images capturing various anatomies, including chest, spine, back, arm, leg, and more, acquired from both public and internal sources.
dcterms:title: 2D X-ray dataset (DX)

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 105,006,320 images/slices of various anatomies and imaging modalities, including CT, MRI, and a small proportion of X-ray images, primarily sourced from internal data.
dcterms:title: 2D mixed modality dataset (DM)

dcterms:creator: A. E. Johnson
T. J. Pollard
S. J. Berkowitz
N. R. Greenbaum
M. P. Lungren
C.-y. Deng
R. G. Mark
S. Horng
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 24,440 3D CT volumes derived from 1,345,040 DICOM slices of non-contrast CT head scans, acquired from internal sources.
dcterms:title: 3D computed tomography (CT) dataset (DCT)
